title: Kim Kardashian Reflects on Final Straws in Kanye West Marriage, Says He Gave Away Their Lamborghinis While Having an “Episode”
summary: During a Wednesday appearance on 'Call Her Daddy,' Kardashian reflected on the beginnings of her relationship with West, their divorce and “not easy” co-parenting: “It's probably been a couple months since we've heard from him.”

title: Janelle Monáe Reveals Her Packed Halloween Schedule and Teases 2025 Costume
summary: In partnership with her Wondaland Arts Society, the superstar singer is curating a monthlong series of events covering music, film, games and live experiences to celebrate her favorite season of the year.
